Cassandra: Autonomous Multi-Agent AI System

What if AI could handle the complex analysis, giving radiologists more time for what matters most—patient care?

CASSANDRA DELIVERS:

Automated 3D brain tumor segmentation

Minutes instead of hours

Consistent, reproducible measurements

Immersive VR visualization

Comprehensive clinical reports

From raw MRI scan to clinical insight—fully autonomous, intelligently processed, immersively visualized.
